data.actual_result: Channels/Categories stop at a point, leaving a giant empty area below, sometimes without scrollbar
data.expected_result: Channels/Categories should fill in the area until the bottom of the screen
data.short_description: Channels/Categories disappear under the wrong circumstances
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a voice channel in an uncollapsed category, around the top of your server - Have many people, including yourself, in this voice channel - Have hide names off - Be scrolled up to the top - Have enough channels and categories below the voice channel's category to reach off screen(require scrolling) - Collapse the voice channel's category
